title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Holden Colorado RG 2.8L Diesel – Fuel Manager FM602DPK Pre Filter Water Separator Kit

content.rendered:
Fuel Manager Separator kit for:
Holden Colorado RG 2.8L 2012 – 17

This filter unit is to be used as a Pre-Filter to separate water & contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. Comes complete with very specific fitting instructions and mounting bracket so all of the hard work is done !

Kit FM602DPK Includes:
Fuel Manager 30 micron Filtration Unit
Mounting Bolts, Washers and Nyloc Nuts
Spare 30 Micron Replacement Filter
3m 3/8 Inch Quality Fuel Hose
Direction Plus Filter Bracket
3/8 Inch Straight Male Quick Fittings
2x Black 90 degree ‘Quick Fittings’ (9.89mm) 8. 2x ¼ Male brass ‘Quick Fittings’
1x Black 90 degree ‘Quick Fitting’ (9.49mm)
1x Black straight ‘Quick Fitting’ (9.49mm)
6mm Bolt & washer
Blanking Plugs
Hose Clamps
Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

NOTE: 100+ Series Fuel Manager System – The 11.8mm straight male fitting may be required for utility applications. The fitting is used with the line FROM the tank. The female 11.8mm is then joined. The 11.8mm MALE is not used in Colorado 7 as the fitting is already in the line from the tank.

Download PDF Info >

Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste.
